sentences.cn: 而且, 网站审查也在减少.

sentences.en: As micro - messaging spreads overseas, the threat of censorship looms in certain parts of the world.
sentences.cn: 自从微博客在海外流行开来, 审查的威胁就在世界上某些地区出现.

sentences.en: His message was throttled by censorship.
I'm opposed to censorship in any shape or form.
sentences.cn: 我反对任何形式的审查.

sentences.en: If local press practice self - censorship, how can we expect Hong Kong people to voice out?
sentences.cn: 若香港传媒也在 自我 审查的时候, 还期望谁为港人发声?

sentences.en: It is stretching a point to call this censorship.
sentences.cn: 把这称为审查有点儿牵强。

sentences.en: Once you start looking for censorship, it pops up everywhere.
sentences.cn: 一旦你开始寻找找寻审查的痕迹, 它将出现在任何地方.

sentences.en: PEN declares for a free press and opposes arbitrary censorship in time of peace.
sentences.cn: 笔会主张新闻自由并反对和平时期之强迫检查.

sentences.en: The censorship provoked little surprise among some of China's more knowledgeable Web users, however.
sentences.cn: 这种审查在中国一些资深网民看来一点都不奇怪.

sentences.en: The new censorship law will put the clock back ( by ) 50 years.
sentences.cn: 新的审查条例是 开倒车,要退回到50年前的水平.

sentences.en: The newspapers were effectively muzzled by strict censorship laws.
sentences.cn: 严厉的新闻审查法有效地使那些报纸沉默了下来.

sentences.en: The press reacted to the demand for censorship with angry editorials.
sentences.cn: 报界用一篇篇充满愤怒言辞的社论回答新闻检查的要求.

sentences.en: The theme of this year's joumalism conference is the question of censorship.
sentences.cn: 今年新闻界会议的主题是检查问题.

sentences.en: There is normally no censorship of mail.
What is Marie - Ange Guilleminot MAG account of postwar censorship?
sentences.cn: 对战后审查机构有什么描述?

words.tran_cn: 监察的，审查的；检查官的
检查员；[心理] 潜意识压抑力；信件检查员

trans.tran_en: the practice or system of censoring something
